titles.title: Title-page with a frame containing an Old Mann and Man Drinking surrounded by Bees

classification.condition: Used in: Ein heylsams Buchlein [...] von der Beicht [...], Johann Rhau-Grunenberg, Wittenberg 1520 (Title-page)

pageContext.description:
Title-border with a man with a squirrel on his shoulder, a man drinking, the arms of Saxony above and those of Wittenberg below. Used in at least ten editions of Martin Luther's 'Ein heylsams Buchlein von doctor Martinus Luther August. von der Beicht gemacht durch Georgiu Spalatinu geteutscht' published by J. Rhau-Grunenberg in Wittenberg between 1520-1522. In later editions (1522-1525) the shield at the top is empty.
[cda 2018]
pageContext.dimensions:
Sheet: 16.4 x 12.9 cm
[Exhib. Cat. Düsseldorf 2017, 197, No. 101]
